text: Not from exile but outside the game.
I’m really tired of the abilities like her last one
And her minus. Green should be fighting, not sucker-punching
So I guess I only like her plus
Whatever :joy:
Sucker punching is fine.
Weird.
Feels not really Vivien-ish outside of her Ult.
That should be a Red ability
Green doing it is super lame and really unnecessary
The outside the game thing just creates awkward moments when that one guy starts to do it and you have to choose to be the asshole and tell him no
Not at all. Red already deals damage in general, for green it’s completely dependent upon creatures.

Having it be in green makes it feel like green is getting away with something it shouldn’t be. Even if you don’t want to give it to Green, restrict it to Gruul. It’s a strictly upgraded fight. Green already has big creatures anyway
I'm okay with it. It'll pushes her abilities a bit, but they feel like her. I agree that I hate her Ult, though.
A 3/3 shouldn’t be punching another 3/3 and survive. Green doesn’t have first strike, so why should it have this?
I think we're going to be seeing more damage prevention effects.
According to the Mechanical Color Pie, one-sides fight is primary in green and secondary for red.
<@U4V5EHQ2G> apparently <@UGK9N4JJ2>ing himself.
Did he?
Put on your bi-focals, pop pop
I like his better
The “readers” if you will
I see new Vivien twice from <@U4V5EHQ2G> in the stream.
Last one has an edited -5
Check your prescription
It's funny because he's slightly older than me
Still Angeloing.
It’s funny because he was our editor
Joey might need to proofread our old work
You young kids with your stupid hats.
I know where it’s primary, I just don’t think it’s correct. It’s not green to me :man-shrugging:
Henry read the fucking -5!
:joy:
It shows up twice from Dana for me too
May be a caching thing since I used the same name
And again. On purpose that time?
Different file name, so if you're not seeing the difference not sure what to say

attachments.fallback: Someone sent a GIF in #mtg-spoilers using Tenor

text: Despite all my issues with the card, the artwork is great :kissing_heart:
Yongiae Choi has been putting in work the past few sets.
Are they “killing it lately”?
Or is seb proprietary to murdering things with recency?
I hate her hair, but the art is solid besides that
And that's more a design thing since every artist uses the same stupid hair cut on her

Just a pet peeve of mine. You have the entirety of human history to look at for hair styles as well as the boundless limits of your imagination unconstrained by any particular sense of local aesthetic . . . and you pick the same cool-for-the-next-six-months haircut as your barrista.
It was lame when every male 90's character had a goatee, and when every 80's fantasy character had big Fabio/Farrah Fawcett hair, too.
But what if my barista is attractive?
Do they get bonus points or points deducted?

You an think your barista is attractive without being so uninspired as to make your character look cool by giving them a haircut based on what's cool in the narrow window from mid-May 2018 through the end of December 2020
Like I said it's just a pet peeve that has zero basis on anything.
Gross 6cmc
Didn't need the sorcery caveat either
Yikes. Oh well. They can’t all be great.
Sweet you can even sacrifice the demon token to discard more and lose more life!
Oh, I thought the artifact sacrificed itself after a single use. That is substantially better.
For what it’s worth, I mostly evaluate uncommons for limited.
This seems bad in limited too
Maybe you are flooded and can discard a land, but discarding AND saccing?

Think of it like upgrading.
Most things in Limited aren’t going to be good as a 5/5 Flyer.

Have a spare soldier? It’s now a 5/5
yeah, but it is going to require you have have life
and cards to discard
you’re two for oneing yourself if it’s a normal creature and not a token
and losing life, at 6 mana
I’m not saying that this card doesn’t have a place, but you need to be in a token centric control build
or have just the nuts for recurrsion

I disagree about it being a 2-for-1 in an actual sense.
Yea, if we look at it as losing a creature and a card, yea, it is by strict.
But you’re not sacrificing a useful creature.
You’re side-grading your worst creature.

It’s not going to be for every deck, but sealed is going to be slow enough for this to work which I think is the most common Limited format most of us play.
You don’t need many token producers for this to be good either.
against an aggro deck and playing this on turn 6 might be too late already
again, don’t think it’s straight trash, a 5/5 flyer is no joke
just not busted
I never claimed it was busted. I just disagree it’s bad in limited.
It’s great in most parody states, silly good when ahead, ok if you’re behind, just kinda depends on how you are behind
I often try to parody my opponents. Really throws them off their game n
